parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: 0 - All dimensions in the view 1 - All dimensions of the currently selected component (for assembly drawings) 2 - All dimensions of the currently selected feature 3 - All dimensions of the assembly

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertModelDimensions
description: Inserts model dimensions into the selected drawing view according to the option specified.
